ques: Search an Xbox Wireless controller with green color and rated above 4 stars.
Search for women's golf polos in m size, priced between 50 to 75 dollars, and save the lowest priced among results.
Find a gaming desktop with Windows 11 Home, and the disk size should be 1TB.
Find climbing gears and sort the results by price high to low. Answer the first 3 results after sorting.
Find the used Nintendo Switch Lite on Amazon then filter by 'Used - Good', tell me the cheapest one that is 'Used - Good'.
Browse black strollers within $100 to $200 on Amazon. Then find one Among these black strollers with over 20,000 reviews and a rating greater than 4 star.
Browse the women's hiking boots on Amazon and filter the results to show only those that are waterproof and have a rating of at least 4 stars and size 6.
Find the cheapest Samsung-made Android tablet with screen between 10-10.9 inches on Amazon. Only answer the cheapest one.
Find a dog bed on Amazon that is washable and has a length of at least 30 inches.
Find a stainless steel kitchen sink with double bowls on Amazon. Sort the results and find the cheapest one with FREE delivery.
Check reviews for a Ride On Car with 100+ reviews & 4+ stars rating on Amazon. Give me the top review about this Ride On Car.
Browse best selling black hoodies in mens size Big and Tall that is between $25 and $50 on Amazon.
Find the new surge protector on Amazon with 6 to 8 outlets under 25 dollars with customer reviews above 4+ stars.
Find a pair of mens running shoes in black, size 7, 4+ stars and under $50 and add them to my cart on Amazon.
Find the Return Policy for Mens Rhinestone Skull Graphic Shirt on Amazon. Color: Black, Size: XX-Large. If Free return is avaliable, tell me how to return this item.
Show me the list of baby products that are on sale and under 10 dollars on Amazon. Provide at least 2 on sale products
Open Amazon's home page and tell me what the deal is that is going on at the moment, list the names of at least 2 items that are on offer and tell me what percent off they are.
Look for an English language book on roman empire history in the Amazon Kindle store. Sort by newests arrivals and look for a title that will be released within a month.
Search for a wireless ergonomic keyboard with backlighting and a rating of at least 4 stars. The price should be between $40 to $60. Save the product with the 500+ customer reviews.
Find a stainless steel, 12-cup programmable coffee maker on Amazon. The price range should be between $100 to $200. Report the one with the 4+ customer rating.
Search for a set of non-stick, oven-safe cookware on Amazon. The set should include at least 10 pieces and be priced under $150.
Look for a men's waterproof digital sports watch with a heart rate monitor on Amazon. It should be priced between $50 to $100.
Search for a queen-sized, hypoallergenic mattress topper on Amazon. It should have a memory foam material and be priced between $50 to $100.
Find a portable Bluetooth speaker on Amazon with a water-resistant design, under $50. It should have a minimum battery life of 10 hours.
Search for a yoga mat on Amazon that is at least 6mm thick, non-slip, and eco-friendly. The price should be under $50.
Find a set of solar-powered garden lights on Amazon with a minimum pack of 10 lights. They should be LED and priced under $50.
Locate the highest-rated fiction book released in 2024 on Amazon, with a minimum of 50 customer reviews.
Find a compact digital camera on Amazon with a zoom capability of at least 10x, rated 4 stars or higher, and priced between $100 to $300.
Search for an electric kettle on Amazon with a capacity of at least 1.5 liters, made of stainless steel, and with a customer rating of 4 stars or above.
Search for a portable air conditioner on Amazon suitable for a room size of 300 sq ft, with energy efficiency rating, and compare the prices of the top three search results.
Search for a children's science experiment kit on Amazon suitable for ages 8-13, with at least a 4-star rating and priced under $30.
Locate a queen-sized bedspread on Amazon with a floral pattern, and check if it's available in blue color.
Find a bird feeder on Amazon suitable for small birds, with an anti-squirrel mechanism, and check if it's available with free shipping.
Locate a travel guide book on Amazon for Japan, published in 2024, with at least 20 customer reviews.
